page.title: 17Leisure time,Fearn.
page.content: On Saturday mornings I have a long lie as there is no school.About ten thirty I go down to Harry's shop for the paper and a sweet.Then I go and play on my roller boots.After lunch I take my sweet and go and play with my friend Lesley.We always go along to the football pitch where we play on the adjacent obstacle course, the slide and roundabout and lastly the swings.After that we go home to Lesley's house to play tapes and games.I usually have to go home at 5 o' clock, but I get longer on a Saturday.After supper Lesley usually calls round and we play in the back garden.When Lesley goes home,I watch television.Before bed I like to listen to records.
